subject: Football
lead_paragraph: During his news conference Wednesday, Patriots Coach Bill Belichick would not be drawn into a battle of words with LaDainian Tomlinson, who criticized Belichick for his team's post-game celebration on Sunday.
snippet: During his news conference Wednesday, Patriots Coach Bill Belichick would not be drawn into a battle of words with LaDainian Tomlinson, who criticized Belichick for his team's post-game celebration on Sunday.
